LetsGetYouVerified.Title: Let's get you verified

Option1.Label: OPTION 1
Option1.Title: Scan the QR code
Option1.Description: Scan the QR code with your camera app.

Option2.Label: OPTION 2
Option2.Title: Send link via SMS
Option2.Description: We’ll text a secure link to your mobile at no extra cost.

PrepareDocument.Title: Prepare a valid document
PrepareDocument.Description: Make sure it’s not expired or physically damaged.

UseSmartphone.Title: Use a smartphone
UseSmartphone.Description: You need a smartphone in order to continue.

LetsGetYouVerified.PrivacyPolicy: Read more about your personal data processing in Preventor’s privacy policy.

SecureLinkSent.Title: Check your mobile
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle: We’ve sent a secure link to
SecureLinkSent.SubTitle2: It may take a few minutes to arrive.

Start.Title: Start your identity verification
Start.SubTitle:
We'll walk you through a seamless 
process to verify your identity

StartAuthentication.Title: Start your authentication verification
StartAuthentication.SubTitle:
We'll walk you through a seamless 
process to verify your authentication

PrepareSteps.Title: Identity Verification
Items: Be prepared to take a selfie.
Prepare your identity document to be scanned, we accept:
Have your email address ready.
Have your mobile phone ready.
Have your proof of residency ready.
PrepareSteps.Agreements: By clicking continue you agree with the terms of service and our privacy policy.

PrepareAuthentication.Title: Preventor authenticator
Items: Be prepared to take a selfie.
Position yourself in good lighting.
Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Position your face inside the circle on screen until two green circles appears.

ChooseCountry.Title:
From which country 
is your document?
ChooseCountry.SubTitle: Please select the country from the dropdown list.

ChooseDocument.Title: Identity Verification
Scan your ID
ChooseDocument.SubTitle: Please select the ID issuing country from the dropdown list

GlobalDocument.Title: Identity Verification
GlobalDocument.Title2: Get ready to scan you ID
GlobalDocument.SubTitle: Prepare the front of your document
GlobalDocument.SubTitle2: Tab to view tips for scanning your ID

Tips.Title: Tips for scanning your ID
Items: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.
Avoid glare and shadow.

PrepareSelfie.Title: Identity Verification
PrepareSelfie.SubTitle: Please put your phone in front of your face
PrepareSelfie.SubTitle2: Tab to see tips for taking your selfie

Tips.Title: Tips to take your selfie
Items: Position yourself in good lighting.
Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Position your face inside the circle on screen until two green circles appears.
Move your head slightly when instructed.

PrepareRfid.Title: Scan your electronic ID
PrepareRfid.SubTitle: Tab for tips on how to scan your eID
PrepareRfid.SubTitle2: Tab for tips on how to scan your eID

Tips.Title: Tips on how to scan your eID
Items: Prepare to hold your phone near your ID to scan the electronic chip from your document.
Some ePassports, such as the US ePassport, have an RFID chip embedded in the back cover of the travel document.

MotionDetection.Correct: Move your head to the side

CameraDocument.Title: Identity Verification
CameraDocument.SubTitle: Make sure your ID document clearly shows your face.

CameraDocumentNative.TitleFront: Prepare the front of your document
CameraDocumentNative.TitleBack: Prepare the back of your document

ConfirmPhotoDocument.Title: Make sure your ID document clearly shows your face.
ConfirmPhotoDocument.SubTitle: Use this image?

FailedAttempts.Title:
Your identity verification
has been submitted
FailedAttempts.SubTitle:
We’ll review your information and we’ll 
get back to you as soon as possible.

ExceededAttempts.Title: You've exceeded the maximum limit of attempts
ExceededAttempts.SubTitle: Let’s try that again, but first, please:
Items: Position yourself in good lighting with a neutral expression, no smiling.
Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.
Prepare to select the type of ID and to take a picture.

Tips.Title: Tips on how to scan your eID
Items: Prepare to hold your phone near your ID to scan the electronic chip from your document.
Some ePassports, such as the US ePassport, have an RFID chip embedded in the back cover of the travel document.

RenewalCompleted.Title: Your session has been renewed
RenewalCompleted.SubTitle: To continue with your identity verification, click continue.

Renewal.Title: Your session has been expired
Renewal.SubTitle: If you want to request a new invitation to verify your identity, click the continue button.

SaveChanges.Title: Save changes
SaveChanges.SubTitle: Do you want to save and continue?

SkipRfid.Title: Having trouble reading your electronic ID?

Tips.Title: Tips to scan your electronic document
Items: Prepare to hold your phone near your ID to scan the electronic chip from your document.

TryAgainDocument.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainDocument.Title2:
We coudn’t complete 
your identify verification
TryAgainDocument.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:
TryAgainDocument.PossibleError: If you consider this is an error or if you have another identity document, please try again.

Tips.Title: Tips to scan your ID
Items: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.
Avoid glare and shadow.

IdExpired.Title: ID expired
IdExpired.Description: Your identity document has expired however, if you consider this is an error or if you have another identity document, please try again.

TryAgainDocumentNative.Title: We couldn't take a good picture of your ID
TryAgainDocumentNative.SubTitle: But first, please make sure of the following:
Items: Let's use your camera in a better way.
Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.
Avoid glare and shadow.

TryAgainSelfie.Title: Let’s try that again
TryAgainSelfie.SubTitle: Move your head a little bit

Tips.Title: Tips to take your selfie
Items: Position yourself in good lighting.
Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Make sure your face is centered within the two circles.

TimeOut.Title: Are you still there?
TimeOut.SubTitle: If not, we'll close this session in:

Email.SubTitle: What’s your email address?.
Email.SubTitle2: We’ll send you a verification code to this email.

Phone.Title: Identity Verification

Phone.SubTitle2: We’ll send you a verification code to this number.

Your identity verification

IdentityVerificationSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll get back to you. Thank you!

StreamLineSubmitted.Title: Your digital onboarding has been submitted
StreamLineSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

AuthenticationSubmitted.SubTitle: We’ll review your information and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

SubTitle.IdentityVerification: Your identity verification has been completed.
SubTitle.Streamline: Your streamline digital onboarding has been completed.
SubTitle.Global: We'll get back to you. Thank you!

DeniedAccessCamera.Title: You have denied access to your camera.
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMicroFrontEnd:
In order to continue,
please enable access to your camera in your browser settings.
DeniedAccessCamera.SubTitleMobile: In order to continue, please enable access to your camera in your phone settings.

DeniedDeviceId.Title: You have denied access to your device id.
DeniedDeviceId.SubTitleMobile: In order to continue, please enable access to your device id in your phone settings.

Error.Title: There's a problem
Error.SubTitle: We're really sorry. we're working to fix it as soon as possible. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

InformationNoMatch.Title: Sorry to hear that your information doesn't match

Tips.Title: Tips to upload your ID
Items: Image must be at least 600 x 600 pixels but not more than 1200 x 1200 pixels.
Image must be in JPEG or PNG file format.
Image must be at least 56 kilobytes but not more than 10 megabytes.

MaxAttemptLimit.Title: Max attempt limit
MaxAttemptLimit.SubTitle: You've exceeded the maximum attempt limit. We were unable to complete the verification process.

OTPError.Title: Oops!
OTPError.SubTitle: The verification code you entered is incorrect.
